description:
Feature: Successful and Unsuccessful ChangePassword for the Consumer application
		     As an user of the application
		     I want to test Change Password feature
name: Successful and Unsuccessful ChangePassword for the Consumer application

elements.description:
Description for 1) successfulSignIn - To verify successful SignIn for Consumer application with DATA SignIn_Success
Input Data: [[SAKSAKG100002, welcome], []]
elements.name:
1) successfulSignIn - To verify successful SignIn for Consumer application with DATA SignIn_Success
Input Data: [[SAKSAKG100002, welcome], []]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON home page
3. Then I am ON signIn pop_up
4. And  I ENTER valid credentials with DATA SignIn_Success
6. Then I am ON dashboard page

elements.description:
Description for 1) To verify success scenario to change password for Consumer Application with DATA ChangePassword_Success
Input Data: [[welcome, welcome#1, welcome#1], [passChange_Success]]
elements.name:
1) To verify success scenario to change password for Consumer Application with DATA ChangePassword_Success
Input Data: [[welcome, welcome#1, welcome#1], [passChange_Success]]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON dashboard page
2. When I CLICK profileImageIcon change password tab is displayed
4. Then I am ON changePassword page
5. And I ENTER valid password details with DATA ChangePassword_Success
6. When I SUBMIT the form and successful change password message is displayed
7. Then I am ON dashboard page
